original_title: Une fable en délire : la poule, le chat et autres bestioles
overview: A cat, a hen and her chicks live peacefully together beside a farm. Like all close friends, they sometimes indulge in a good-natured squabble. But one night, the wolf comes out of the forest and kidnaps the hen. The cat and the chicks bravely decide to go and rescue her. This is the beginning of an epic tale and a wild adventure...
title: The Hen, the Cat and Other Beasts - A Loopy Tale
